page.title: 13Huntley Guides and Brownies.
page.content: On Monday nights some girls between the age of ten and fifteen meet at the Scout H.Q.They meet at 7.00 and finish at 8.30.Between those times they work on interest badges,play games,go on nature walks,put up tents and light fires to cook on. Each Guide has a uniform which is made up of a blue blouse,a blue skirt, a coloured necker(of your pack) a special belt and a hat.Our pack pays a fee of twenty pence each week to cover the cost of badges. Brownies also meet at the Scout H.Q. but on a Wednesday night at 6.15 and finish at 7.30. Brownies start at the age of seven and end at the age of ten. The uniform is a brown dress, a brown belt, a yellow tie and a brown bobble hat.Most girls have been a Brownie and have enjoyed it.
